data.name: Vintage Records from Hell
data.detailed_description:
Ever dream of running your own Heavy Metal Record Store? How about having the most amazing Vintage Record collection?

If so, dear metalhead, this game was made just for you.



Become the owner of Vintage Records from Hell and experience the classic rags to riches story for yourself in this unique store manager, tycoon type gaming experience.

Start your journey in a rundown store paying way too much for equipment and struggle to build up your very own Heavy Metal Record Shop day by day.

Meet an ensemble of unique neighborhood misfits, each with their own story to tell and albums to sell. Follow their story, and become the most coveted record store in town.



Learn to negotiate prices and collect rare records from different Heavy Metal subgenre ranging from Grindcore to Glam Metal to Death Metal.



Bring prestige to your establishment by upgrading your gear and improving the visual appearance of the shop to attract a higher-paying clientele.

Keep your record racks filled with the latest heavy metal subgenre trends and adapt your inventory so you don’t end up with stock no one is looking for.

Witness as local events from the Heavy Metal scene influence album sales and turns a unique vintage albums into a collector’s wet dream.

Plan out your marketing campaigns with flyers, newspaper ads or radio jingles.



What if your Heavy Metal shop was the forsaken gateway into hell?
What if the record company selling you bulk albums at a great price has an ulterior motive?
Perhaps you are on your way to save the world from an impending apocalypse?
Anything is possible...right?


NOTE : The characters are still being drawn and the story is still being written.

data.short_description: Ever dream of running your own Heavy Metal Record Store? How about having the most amazing Vintage Vinyl collection?If so, dear metalhead, this game was made just for you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz (intel Celeron / AMD athlon 64 x2)
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD Radeon
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz ( Intel Core i5 / AMD Phenom II )
  • Graphics: GeForce 8000+ /Radeon HD 5000+
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
